narrative.title: 45Th Infantry Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: American Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Standard US Infantry Division - triangular organization (three infantry regiments). First combat for division in Tunisia Campaign. Role: offensive operations in central Tunisia supporting II Corps drive.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: mixed terrain: coastal plains, hills, and wadis in central Tunisia

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: National Guard division (Oklahoma, Colorado, Arizona, New Mexico) with high state unit pride

environment.terrain_type: mixed terrain: coastal plains, hills, and wadis in central Tunisia
